verbs.description: israel orders immediate halt of fuel deliveries to [V: gaza] israel defence minister avigdor lieberman has ordered an immediate halt to fuel deliveries headed to gaza in response to what he said were attacks against israeli soldiers and civilians his office announced on friday israel gaza defence minister avigdor lieberman hamas
